content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I am not interested in negotiating the price. My goal is to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Let's start the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my intention was to secure a lower rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China
